sections_changed: II. PURCHASE PRICE AND PAYMENT TERMS
summary_of_the_change: The purchase price was reduced from $475,000 to $465,000, and the earnest money deposit increased from $15,000 to $20,000. New financing terms were introduced, including a conventional mortgage loan of $372,000 and a 28-day period to obtain loan commitment. A clause was added allowing termination if financing is not obtained (Sec. II).
The inspection period was extended from 10 days to 14 days from the Effective Date (Sec. III).
The closing date was extended from April 30, 2024, to May 15, 2024 (Sec. IV).
The clause allowing the Buyer to conduct a final walkthrough inspection within 24 hours prior to closing was removed (Sec. V).
